## Events.fromJson() function

Decode the JSON into an event.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function fromJson(json: any, workspace: Workspace): Abstract;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  json | any | JSON representation. |
|  workspace | [Workspace](./blockly.workspace_class.md) | Target workspace for event. |

**Returns:**

[Abstract](./blockly.events_namespace.abstract_class.md)

The event represented by the JSON.
